name: Farmer's Market Finder
description: Web app built with JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap and Knockout that lets visitors enter a US zip code and shows nearby Farmers Markets based on data obtained from the USDA National Farmers Market Directory on a Google Map.

name: Link Collector
description: Multi-user bookmarking web app built with Python and Flask that users can log in to with Google.

name: Hearthstone Deck Saver
description: Web app built with JavaScript that lets you save copied HearthstoneÂ® decks to the browser's local storage.

name: Meditation Timer
description: Meditation Timer web app built with JavaScript that lets you input the number of minutes you'd like to meditate and alerts you when the time is up.
